comments:
20050808

If you have no enablement on your decorator then you will get an NPE. We should
also consider setting the enablement as a required value as you will never
enable without it.

Created an attachment (id=25840)
Plug-in that demonstrates the NPE

No enablement in our other extension points means always enabled so we should be
consistent
How do you verify something that hasn't appeared in a build yet?  >:)
